SECTION_HISTORY.TITLE: Our Story
SECTION_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: It was back in December 2014  when we first met it started exchanging a quick “nice to meet you” years later in August of 2017 our paths would cross again, and after a very patriotic date on september 16th we would quickly become inseparable. It wasn’t long before we came to love each other unconditionally and become a family along with our daughter Sofia. After 8 years of so many adventures and treasured moments we’re very pleased to invite you to a celebration of our love.

CEREMONY.TITLE: Wedding
CEREMONY.DESCRIPTION: Our wedding will be held in Hacienda murmullo de agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC

DRESS_CODE.TITLE: Dress code
DRESS_CODE.DESCRIPTION: Formal attire. Women: Midi and long dresses are welcome, floral or romantic (the choice is yours); please avoid white or red. Men: Formal, suit and tie.

RECEPTION.TITLE: Wedding Reception
RECEPTION.DESCRIPTION: The celebration will be held in Hacienda murmullo de agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC

SECTION_GIFTS.TITLE: Our most treasured gift will be your attendance
SECTION_GIFTS.DESCRIPTION: However if you wish to bring a gift, we’ll have a mailbox for cash envelopes per Mexican tradition or a gift card from target wal-mart or costco shop, would be greatly appreciated

SECTION_LOCATION.INTRO: Wedding and reception will be held in
SECTION_LOCATION.STAY_DESCRIPTION: We greatly appreciate that you have chosen to celebrate with us, and we know it’s a long way home after a party, for those want to stay in Valle de Guadalupe we have a few options below:

HOTELS.NAME: Tierra Mía Hacienda ruta del Vino
